HomePage.descriptionSEO: Ophthalmologist consultation. Trust your vision to professionals ‚Äî New Vision Clinic in Vilnius. ‚ú¥Ô∏è Eye Center No. 1 in Lithuania. ‚úÖ Ophthalmology Center ‚Äî take advantage of special offers on eye treatment. ‚úÖ Advanced diagnostics and effective treatment. üëç A reputation proven over time
HomePage.title: NEW VISION
HomePage.description: Laser vision correction and the treatment of astigmatism and cataract are performed as safe, state-of-the-art eye surgery by experienced ophthalmic surgeons specialising in restoring clear vision.
HomePage.slogan: Laser eye surgery, astigmatism, and cataract treatment ‚Äì our tasks, which we perform professionally, safely, and efficiently.
HomePage.promoText: Money-back offer for laser vision correction
HomePage.raynerTextPC: <bold>the world's #1</bold> intraocular lens for safe and effective cataract treatment
HomePage.servicesTitle: In our ophthalmology clinic, we provide a full range of ophthalmology services
HomePage.servicesText: At the eye disease clinic ‚ÄúNaujas regƒójimas‚Äù in Vilnius, patients have access to all modern methods of treating eye conditions, allowing vision problems to be managed effectively and safely.
HomePage.advantagesSubtitle: Advantages of our ophthalmology clinic in Vilnius
HomePage.advantagesTitle: Our ophthalmologists in Vilnius are committed to giving every patient the chance to see the world bright and clear again, to the fullest extent that restored vision allows
HomePage.advantagesText: At our medical centre, every patient has access to a full range of ophthalmology services. Consultations and treatment are provided by experienced, highly qualified eye doctors.
HomePage.choiceTitle: Choosing an eye clinic is an important decision for everyone
HomePage.choiceText1: Many people do not realise how much good vision affects their daily life until they personally face the first signs of difficulties and a noticeable decline in eyesight.
HomePage.choiceText2: Vision problems can develop at any age, which is why it is essential to see an eye specialist and have a proper eye examination as soon as the first symptoms appear.
HomePage.choiceGreen: If you have been thinking about having a comprehensive eye check-up, now is the perfect time to book an appointment and take care of your vision.
HomePage.approachTitle: At our eye clinic, every patient receives a personalised treatment plan: for some, the best option is laser vision correction, while for others conservative treatment and regular monitoring are more appropriate. Our goal is to choose the safest and most effective solution for you.
HomePage.aboutTitle: Our eye clinic in Vilnius combines medical professionalism with advanced technology to protect your vision
HomePage.aboutText1: From the very first day, our goal has been to offer patients the best that modern ophthalmology can provide ‚Äì precise diagnostics, state-of-the-art equipment and effective treatment methods for a wide range of eye conditions.
HomePage.aboutText2: Our mission is to do everything possible to help you maintain your vision in excellent condition and continue seeing the world bright and clear for many years.
HomePage.aboutGreen: The clinic is accredited with the highest category and certified according to the <link>ISO 9001 valid since: 2015</link>.
HomePage.doctorsTitle: Our team consists of highly qualified eye doctors, medical science degree holders and senior specialists with extensive clinical experience
HomePage.doctorsText: Consultations and surgery are performed by some of the leading specialists in ophthalmology, as evidenced by dozens of published scientific papers and tens of thousands of successfully completed operations.
HomePage.feedbacksTitle: What our patients say about us
HomePage.feedbacksText: Our eye centre has performed over 1,000,000 successful laser vision correction procedures and provided more than 5,000,000 ophthalmology consultations.
HomePage.bookingTitle: Convenient booking and transparent consultation cost
HomePage.bookingText: We have made the process of contacting the clinic as simple as possible. You only need to book an appointment with an ophthalmologist in Kyiv online or by phone.
HomePage.upButtonHint: To the top of the page

AboutPage.titleSEO: About the Clinic. British Ophthalmology Center | EYES
AboutPage.descriptionSEO: ‚ûî About the Clinic. Premium care for your vision. ‚úÖ The best ophthalmologists in Kyiv ‚úÖ A comprehensive approach to diagnostics and treatment üëç Proven experience and an impeccable reputation ‚òéÔ∏è 0 800 507 077
AboutPage.title: About the Clinic
AboutPage.description: Since 2006, we have been restoring vision and a full life without glasses
AboutPage.aboutTitle: ¬´British Ophthalmology Center¬ª is an impeccable medical service with special attention to the control of the medical process.
AboutPage.aboutText1: From the very first day, our mission has been to provide patients with only the best that modern ophthalmology can offer. We employ some of the finest specialists in the field, proven by dozens of published scientific papers and tens of thousands of successful surgeries!
AboutPage.aboutText2: Our mission is to help you in every possible way to preserve your vision in perfect condition without surgical intervention. And if it ever happens that you do need surgery, we guarantee that it will be performed by some of the best specialists in ophthalmology!
AboutPage.aboutText3: The high qualifications of our specialists are achieved only through daily practice and continuous learning. A true doctor learns their profession throughout life, and our staff knows this well. We have every reason to be proud of our doctors.
AboutPage.germanText1: We are pleased to announce the opening of a new building of our center ‚Äî a modern space created with one goal: to provide you with an even higher level of ophthalmologic care.
AboutPage.germanText2: The Medical Control Department is located in Germany, with treatment protocols strictly following German standards.
AboutPage.germanText3: We didn‚Äôt just open a new building ‚Äî we created a space where every patient, from child to adult, receives maximum attention and care.
AboutPage.advantTitle: You can be confident in the quality of services provided at the British Ophthalmology Center
AboutPage.advantText: By choosing our clinic, you can always rely on professional and high-quality medical care.
AboutPage.ctaText: Book an eye examination to learn more about the condition of your visual system!
AboutPage.ctaTitle: Take care of your vision health today!
AboutPage.methodsTitle: We perform procedures using unique techniques
AboutPage.methodsGreen: For those who choose the best and accept no compromise
AboutPage.methodsText: Only we use the cold laser vision correction method, ensuring maximum safety for your eyes.
AboutPage.teamTitle: Our team of professionals treats the most complex eye diseases:
AboutPage.teamLi1: In cases of severe eye pathologies and injuries
AboutPage.teamLi2: When the problem cannot be solved by conservative methods
AboutPage.teamLi3: When laser vision correction is not possible for medical reasons

ServicesPage.titleSEO: Ophthalmology Services in Kyiv | British Ophthalmology Center
ServicesPage.descriptionSEO: Full list of ophthalmology services in Kyiv ‚Äì üá∫üá¶üá¨üáß British Ophthalmology Center. ‚ú¥Ô∏è Individual approach to every patient! ‚úÖ Our eye clinic provides a full range of ophthalmology services.
ServicesPage.title: Ophthalmology services
ServicesPage.description: The British Ophthalmology Center provides a full range of modern high-tech ophthalmological services for the treatment of eye diseases in people of all ages.
ServicesPage.sectionTitle: We diagnose all eye diseases and perform microsurgical treatment
ServicesPage.lazerCorectionMethodsTitle: Unique cold laser correction technology ‚Äî only in our clinic
ServicesPage.doctorsText: Our doctors will carefully study the condition of your visual system and determine whether correction is possible in your case.
ServicesPage.lazerne-likuvannya-zahvoryuvan-oka: in laser treatment of eye diseases
ServicesPage.cataractMethodsTitle: Revolutionary cataract treatment technologies ‚Äî exclusively in our clinic
ServicesPage.cataractMethodsText: We use the most advanced phacoemulsification technique ‚Äî the 'Water Flow', which is considered the 'gold standard' in modern ophthalmology.
ServicesPage.lazerEditionPriceText: The technique is selected after the examination, individually for you, to obtain the best result
ServicesPage.callUsText: If you have any questions, call our friendly call center or make an appointment for diagnostics with further consultation.
ServicesPage.catIndTitle: We treat cataract in complex cases:
ServicesPage.catIndText: At our centre, cataract removal procedures are performed by surgeons with experience of at least 50,000 successful interventions.
ServicesPage.catIndListItem2: correction of outcomes after unsuccessful procedures in other clinics
ServicesPage.catIndListItem3: management of the most challenging cases
ServicesPage.raynerCardTitle: We use only premium intraocular lenses.
ServicesPage.raynerTextPC: <bold>the world's #1</bold> intraocular lens for cataract treatment
ServicesPage.reynerItem1: developed with the involvement of artificial intelligence
ServicesPage.raynerAdv: Rayner GALAXY is now available for implantation in our clinic
ServicesPage.lansText1: BiVision RLE is most often recommended after the age of 45, when typical signs of presbyopia appear‚Äîblurred vision while reading, the need to hold text farther away, and rapid visual fatigue. Implantation of a multifocal lens restores comfort and helps reduce the need to constantly switch between different glasses.
ServicesPage.lansText2: At our centre in Vilnius, refractive lens exchange procedures are performed by surgeons with experience of at least **50,000** successful operations.
ServicesPage.raynerCompareText: Rayner GALAXY is based on an innovative spiral optical design. It provides clear vision at any distance and significantly reduces the likelihood of unwanted effects such as halos, glares, or blurring.
ServicesPage.raynerCompareItem5: Natural image perception similar to a healthy human eye
ServicesPage.raynerUniqItem1Text: Comfortable vision for distance, near, and intermediate ranges.
ServicesPage.raynerUniqItem2Text: Fewer halos, glares, and image blurring.
ServicesPage.raynerUniqItem3Text: Fast and comfortable adjustment to your new vision.
ServicesPage.raynerUniqItem4Text: Smooth focus transition between different distances.
ServicesPage.raynerUniqItem5Text: Maximally natural vision with soft contrasts and colors.
ServicesPage.raynerUniqItem6Text: Premium materials and consistently high visual quality.
ServicesPage.raynerAboutTitle: Rayner GALAXY ‚Äî a new standard of vision, available exclusively at our clinic
ServicesPage.raynerAboutText1: The innovative intraocular lens <link>Rayner GALAXY</link> is a premium solution for patients who want not only to eliminate cataracts but also to regain youthful, clear, and comfortable vision, often without needing glasses in everyday life.
ServicesPage.raynerAboutText2: Rayner GALAXY is a next-generation intelligent optical technology. The lens was developed by the British company Rayner ‚Äî one of the world‚Äôs leading leaders in ophthalmic surgery ‚Äî using artificial intelligence algorithms to optimize vision quality and patient comfort.
ServicesPage.raynerAboutItem: It is the world‚Äôs first intraocular lens developed with the involvement of artificial intelligence
